data.title: Byron James Gardiner Obituary 2023
data.meta_description: Byron James Gardiner, II, 73, of Torrington, CT, passed away June 30, 2023, at his home..  He was the beloved husband of Sandra (Turner) Gardiner. and beloved step-father of Kat...
data.text:
Byron James Gardiner, II, 73, of Torrington, CT, passed away June 30, 2023, at his home.. He was the beloved husband of Sandra (Turner) Gardiner. and beloved step-father of Kathryn Burger.

Byron was born December 13, 1949, in New York City, the son of the late Allen and Frances Harriet (Tyler) Gardiner. He was a graduate of Ridgewood High School in Ridgewood, NJ and of University of Northern Colorado with a degree in Elementary Education. He was an avid photographer, a woodworker by trade, and a Newfoundland dog lover.

In addition to his wife Sandra and stepdaughter Kathryn, he is survived by his brother Thomas Gardiner, sister-in-law, Anne Marie Gardiner, and their son Matthew of Northvale, NJ. He is also survived by his brother Douglas Gardiner of Cape Coral, FL, widower of sister-in-law Judy, and their children Kimberly and Katy Rose.

Calling hours will be held on Thursday, July 13, 2023, from 2:00 p.m. to 4:00 p.m. at Cook Funeral Home, 82 Litchfield St., Torrington, CT. Private burial will be in the Gardiner ancestral plot at Stonington Cemetery in Stonington, CT.
